channel.title: Jobs on Yarra Framework
channel.description: Recent content in Jobs on Yarra Framework

item.title: Join Our Development Team
item.description: We are currently looking for software engineers to join our NYU open-source development team, which creates various tools and platforms to simplify clinical translational research, including the Yarra Framework and its sister projects mercure and mtrk. All positions are based in NYC, full-time roles, and come with competitive compensation and benefits packages. Specifically, we are looking for open-source enthusiasts interested in one of the following roles: Software Engineer – Imaging Platforms DevOps Engineer – Imaging Tools Web and Frontend Designer If this sounds exciting to you, please follow the links above and submit your application!
